title: Bioinspired 2D nanofluidic membranes for energy applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2300-2325
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00382E, Review Article
Dandan Lei, Zhen Zhang, Lei Jiang
Bioinspired 2D nanofluidic membranes enable efficient and selective ion transport. Further research in this area is essential to facilitate the development of high-performance energy conversion and storage devices for a sustainable future.
